0.1.name: wordpress/cool-flickr-slideshow
0.1.description: Cool Flickr Slideshow is quick and easy way to embed Flickr slideshows of your Flickr photosets in your posts and pages.In this Plugin, you can use SET, Group, API,User ID for getting photosets from flickr and Plugin will generate Shortcode for you and you just need to use that shortcode to display Flickr Slideshows.
